page.title: 17WORKING LIFE
page.content: We own a pub in the center of Glasgow called the Lymburn.Mum and Dad work 7 days a week.I help my dad sometimes in the celler to gather and sort the bottles.I am going to learn how to wash out the pipes for the beer soon. My sister helps my mum at home by doing the ironing and the dishes and keeping the dog.If my Mum and Dad do get off they work on the house to decorate it. When we do go on holiday, we go to Aviemore.We like to hire a lodge for a week in the centre where there is an arcade,cafe,shops and motorised go-carts that we go on.It is a very good place to go and spend a holiday.
